Plenty of beach towels to utilize. Wanda was always a message away when I reached out to her. TV had all the smart apps and channels you could want. Building itself feels a bit antique-ish but for the price you pay (compared to surrounding hotels), you can’t beat it. The AC worked well enough, I came in October so didn’t need to rely on it the way I would have if it were summer time. All in all, Wanda is a super host for a reason. I would say don’t come here expecting a 5 star modern hotel unit, but rather a home friendly environment filled with Wanda’s love.

review_text:
This unit was absolutely perfect for our "big family vacation" with mom, dad, brother, his wife and kids. The kids had a wonderful time at the pool each day. There were always plenty of beach chairs at the pool, plenty of towels to dry off afterward. Going from the pool to the unit is very fast, and safe enough to let at 10 and 13 year old run pretty free at the pool with no worries about cars or too-deep water. There were 2 friendly security guards that walked the grounds constantly - they said hello and were always nearby. One night someone dropped a glass near the pool desk - they had it blocked off and cleaned up within 15 minutes. The patio was an amazing view. Everyone enjoyed their rooms. The air conditioning works amazingly well, hot day at the beach and then come back to a nice cold room to recharge and sleep. There are a lot of things to do nearby. We walked the boardwalk and down to a few restaurants nearby. If you bring a big family like ours I'd recommend bringing paper plates though - no one wants to do dishes! Bring a crock pot too if you have a chef in the family.
Parking was very easy. We received 3 parking passes for the week and there was always a spot to park.
The place was very clean and has a hard floors & broom - easy cleanup when the kids run in with sandy feet. it was easy to keep clean the entire week we were there. We hope to stay again!

I will share photos of a wine glass I cleaned compared to another from the cabinet. The coffee pot had water residue in it as if it had only been rinsed out. There was dust and dirt build up in places a I feel are unacceptablefor a 5 star. The towel bar above the toilet had a layer of dust on it. In addition to, the shower bar had rust and stains on them. The room had a musty smell to it. The pool room had a hole in the ceiling with debris hanging out barely blocked off with no caution signs near the stair entry to the pool. I do see the 5 star potential, but cleanliness in Covid times is crucial. (especially because in the elevator it specifically states no late checks due to extra time to clean because of covid)
